description.p: Evaluates a logical expression and returns the specified true or false value.

prototypes.prototype: If as A (Expression as L, TrueValue as A, FalseValue as A)

description.p: A logical expression that evaluates to a true or false value.
The value returned if the expression evaluates to true.
The value returned if the expression evaluates to false.
Returns the *[sql:TrueValue]* if the expression evaluates to true. Otherwise, returns the *[sql:FalseValue]*.

discussion.p: The If function evaluates the logical *[sql:Expression]*. If the expression evaluates to true, *[sql:TrueValue]* is returned. Otherwise *[sql:FalseValue]* is returned.

example.caption: If function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT IF(ShippedDate IS NULL , 'Not shipped', 'Shipped') AS Shipped FROM Orders
